KFEIN.IS.summary: Kafein Yazilim Hizmetleri Ticaret A.S. provides various software solutions and services in Turkey and internationally. The company offers intelligent emotion analysis that enables emotion recognition and classification through real-time image or video capturing; facial recognition system that provides instant demographic analysis; personal data protection projects, which allows companies to discover and correctly configure sensitive data; smart parking system to find the closest available parking area, as well as provides automatic transaction option and allows payments without leaving the vehicle; and insurance management system to monitor insurance inventories and policies. It also provides corporate directory application to facilitate in-house communication; robotic process automation, an automatic execution of processes and operations of employees through a software; K-BI, a business intelligence platform where companies can run their performance analysis and report automatically; and K-Reward, a reward management system. In addition, the company offers turnkey projects, managed, integration projects, data management, technology and software development, and consultancy services. It serves telecommunication, insurance, finance and banking, retail, healthcare, manufacturing, and other industries. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

LINK.IS.long_name: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LINK.IS.summary: Link Bilgisayar Sistemleri Yazilimi ve Donanimi Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a software development company in Turkey. The company develops integrated business application software that covers various accounting, production, and commercial operational requirements. Its software products include modules for tracking sales, marketing, purchasing, inventory management, warehouse-store management, current accounts, finance, accounting, production, budget planning, human resources, and fixed assets operations. The company also offers sales and after sales training, and support services through a network of approximately 500 authorized resellers and dealers. It distributes its products through distributor and business partner companies. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

LOGO.IS.long_name: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
LOGO.IS.summary: Logo Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. develops software solutions in Turkey and internationally. The company provides ERP solutions, which include Logo j-Platform, Logo Tiger Wings Enterprise, Logo Tiger 3 Enterprise, Logo Tiger Wings, Logo Tiger 3, Logo Netsis Wings Enterprise, Logo Netsis 3 Enterprise, Logo Netsis Wings, and Logo Netsis 3 Standard; and business analytics solutions, such as Logo Mind Insight, Logo Mind Navigator, and Logo Mind Budget. It also offers e-Invoice, e-Archive invoice, e-Ledger, e-Dispatch, e-Producer Receipt, e-Reconciliation, e-Extract, Connect Banka, Connect B2b, eLogo e-Tahsilat, and e-Self-Employment Invoice; Logo Isbasi, Logo Start 3, Logo GO Wings, Logo GO 3, Logo Netsis Wings Entegre, Logo Netsis 3 Entegre, and Logo Mali MÃ¼savir 3; warehouse management system solutions, consisting of Logo WMS Platform and Logo WMS; Logo Mobile Sales; and Logo Total Soft products, such as Logo Charisma ERP, Logo Charisma HCM, Logo Charisma Analyzer, Logo Charisma Medical Software, and Logo Charisma Leasing. In addition, the company provides human resources solutions, consisting of Logo j-HR, Logo Tiger 3 HR, Logo Bordro Plus, Logo Netsis 3 HR, Logo Netsis 3 Bordro, and Logo Payroll; retail solutions, including Logo Diva Retail, Logo Diva Service, Logo Diva Channel, and Logo Diva Shop; ecosystem solutions; Logo Infosoft products, such as Logo Jugnu Â ERP, Logo SMART DMS & SFA, and Logo CaptainBiz; CRM solutions, which includes Logo CRM; and project solutions that comprises of Logo Treasury Wizard and Logo B2B. Further, it offers work flow management solutions, such as Logo Flow; occupational health and safety, consisting of eLogo ISG; and digital transformation services, including digital transformation consultancy, project management, project implementation, custom software development, customization and integration, post-project support services, and system management. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey.

PENTA.IS.long_name: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S.
PENTA.IS.summary: Penta Teknoloji Urunleri Dagitim Ticaret A.S. engages in the distribution of technology products in Turkey. It offers personal computers, PC components, peripherals and accessories, software, server-storage and networking products, and documentation solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
